# Commit 3 Table
```{r}
data1 <- data %>% 
  mutate(math_mean = mean(tmathss),
            math_sd = sd(tmathss),
            rdg_mean = mean(treadss),
            rdg_sd = sd(treadss))

table1 <- data1 %>% 
  group_by(sex, frl) %>% 
  summarize(across(c(math_mean:rdg_sd), 
                   ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE))) %>% 
  kable() 
```
